meanings.definition: A drug or other agent that lowers high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed hypertensives to help reduce my high blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Many people take hypertensives daily to manage their hypertension.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the hypertensives for vitamins and ended up with very low blood pressure!
meanings.sent4: The hypertensives acted like little warriors, battling against the high blood pressure in my body.
meanings.sent5: The hypertensives were like magical potions, bringing down the high blood pressure with each dose.

meanings.definition: A person who suffers from high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather is one of the hypertensives in our family, so we always watch his diet.
meanings.sent2: The hypertensives at the support group shared their experiences with managing high blood pressure.
meanings.sent3: During the hot summer days, the hypertensives joked about their blood pressure rising with the temperature!
meanings.sent4: In a sea of calm hearts, the hypertensives stood out like stormy waves.
meanings.sent5: The hypertensives were like ticking time bombs, always at risk of their blood pressure spiking.
